== Welcome! ==
<<BR>>
Ubuntu GNOME is an official Ubuntu flavor, built from the Ubuntu repos and coupled tightly with <nowiki>[[http://www.gnome.org/ | GNOME Desktop]]</nowiki>. It is open source and free to use.

We work hard to deliver a refined, user-friendly Ubuntu experience. We're excited for you to try it out, and hope you'll join our community!
<<BR>><<BR>>

The latest long-term release is <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/XenialXerus/ReleaseNotes/UbuntuGNOME | 16.04 LTS (Xenial Xerus)]]</nowiki>.

The first unofficial release, <nowiki>[[UbuntuGNOME-ReleaseNotes-12.10 | 12.10 (Quantal Quetzal)]]</nowiki>, came in October 2012. The first ''official'' release was <nowiki>[[http://ubuntugnome.org/ubuntu-gnome-13-04/ | 13.04 (Raring Ringtail)]]</nowiki>.

The final stable release was <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ZestyZapus/ReleaseNotes/UbuntuGNOME | 17.04 (Zesty Zapus)]]</nowiki>, but it reached End of Life in January 2018.
